LJCDataGrid.summary: Provides custom functionality for a DataGridView control. (D)

remarks.para:
The Row Data Methods
The grid has extended methods for managing rows and row data.
These methods are LJCRowsClear(), LJCAddRow(), LJCInsertRow() and LJCRowSetValues().

The Row Selection Methods
The grid has extended methods for managing the current row.
These methods are LJCGetMouseRow(), LJCSetMouseCurrentRow() and LJCSetCurrentRow().

The Row Selection Changed Methods
There are extended methods for checking if the selected row has changed.
These methods are LJCIsDifferentRow() and LJCSetLastRow().

The Grid Configuration Methods
The grid has extended methods for grid configuration.
These methods are LJCSetPlain(), LJCAddColumn(), LJCAddDisplayColumns() and LJCRestoreColumnValues().

LJCDataGridC.summary: Initializes an object instance and adds it to a container.

LJCRowsClear.summary: Clears the rows without allowing SelectionChange.

LJCRowAdd.summary: Adds a GridRow control to the grid.

LJCRowInsert.summary: Inserts a GridRow control into the grid.

LJCRowSetValues.summary: Updates a grid row with the record values.

LJCGetMouseColumnIndex.summary: Retrieves the column index where the mouse was clicked.

LJCGetMouseRowIndex.summary: Retrieves the row index where the mouse was clicked.

LJCGetMouseColumn.summary: Retrieves the column where the mouse was clicked.

LJCGetMouseRow.summary: Retrieves the row where the mouse was clicked

LJCSetMouseCurrentRow.summary: Sets the current row to the mouse row.
LJCSetMouseCurrentRow.param: The setting for the allow flag.

LJCSetCurrentRow1.param: The setting for the allow flag.

LJCSetCurrentRow2.summary: Sets the current row to the specified index.
LJCSetCurrentRow2.param: The setting for the allow flag.

LJCIsDifferentRow.summary: Compares the current row against the last selected row.
LJCIsDifferentRow.returns: True if the row has changed otherwise false.

LJCSetLastRow.summary: Saves the last selected row index.

LJCSetPlain.summary: Sets the grid to a simple read-only grid.

LJCAddDisplayColumns.summary: Adds the display columns to the grid.

LJCSetLastColumnAutoSizeFill.summary: Sets the last column AutoSizeMode to "Fill" if the columns width is less than the grid width.

LJCAddColumn1.summary: Adds a column to the grid.
LJCAddColumn1.returns: A reference to the added column.

LJCSetCounter.summary: Sets the grid count in the counter label.

LJCExportData.summary: Exports the grid values to a data file.
